name: Welcome to Britain
description: Arrive at the Horizon Festival.

name: Pride Before the Fall
description: Qualify for Horizon Autumn.

name: Winter Has Come
description: Qualify for Horizon Winter.

name: Optional Extras
description: Apply your first Car Mastery.

name: Spring Into Action
description: Qualify for Horizon Spring.

name: Welcome to a New Horizon
description: Qualify for the Horizon Roster.

name: Jolly Cooperation
description: Complete 5 Horizon Life Co-op Races.

name: Human After All
description: Complete 5 PvP Races.

name: With a Little Help From My Friends
description: Take part in your first #FORZATHON Live Event.

name: Teamwork Makes the Dream Work
description: Complete Round 3 of a #FORZATHON Live Event.

name: Life of the Party
description: Take part in 20 #FORZATHON Live Events, completing at least Round 1 in each.

name: Whatever Next?
description: Complete every Showcase Event.

name: Road Warrior
description: Reach Round 10 in the Horizon Road Racing Series.

name: Muddied
description: Reach Round 10 in the Horizon Dirt Racing Series.

name: Bouncy Bouncy, Having Such a Good Time!

description: Reach Round 10 in the Horizon Cross Country Series.

name: I live my life&
description: Reach Round 10 in the Horizon Drag Racing Series.

name: The Dark Side of the Hoon
description: Reach Round 10 of Street Scene.

name: Horizon Fashion Week
description: Unlock 100 clothing items for your character.

name: Official Horizon Board Game
description: Smash all 200 Bonus Boards.

name: I Feel the Need
description: Reach Speed Trap Hero level 10.

name: Apex Predator
description: Reach Speed Zone Hero level 10.

name: Horizon Airlines
description: Reach Danger Sign Hero level 10.

name: "Do you know what 'DK' stands for?"
description: Reach level 10 in The Drift Run.

name: Auto Barn
description: Find and restore your first Barn Find.

name: Antiques Roadshow
description: Find and restore 15 Barn Finds.

name: Taking the Grand Tour
description: View every Beauty Spot.

name: An Illustrious Career
description: Finish 40 different Horizon Story chapters.

name: ALL THE STARS
description: Get 100 stars in Horizon Stories.

name: Week Complete
description: Complete a #FORZATHON Weekly Challenge.

name: Let Me Live That Fantasy
description: Purchase a castle.

name: Cars with Benefits
description: Get your first Forza Edition Car from a Wheelspin.

name: Test your Might
description: Complete The Trial.

name: First-Time Adventurer
description: Complete your first Team Adventure.

name: The Spirit of Adventure
description: Reach level 5 in Racing Team Adventure, Games Team Adventure, or Anything Goes Team Adventure.

name: Certified Adventurer
description: Qualify for a League in Ranked Team Adventure.

name: Well Seasoned
description: Complete a Season Championship and receive a reward.

name: Eyes on the Prize
description: Complete a Season PR Stunt and receive a reward.

name: Purple Split
description: In Rivals, beat a Rival without receiving a "dirty time" penalty.

name: Hit the Jackpot
description: Spin your first Super Wheelspin.

name: Break the Targets!
description: Get 3 stars on every PR Stunt.

name: First Love
description: Buy your first car from the Autoshow.

name: Go the Distance
description: Win a race at The Colossus, The Gauntlet, The Titan or The Marathon.

name: The Noisy Cartographer
description: Drive down every road in Britain.

name: At One with the Car
description: Apply every Car Mastery available for a single car.

name: Master of Many
description: Apply 50 Car Masteries.

name: Accomplished Driver
description: Reach Level 20.

name: Horizon Superstar
description: Gain Superstar Status by reaching Level 200.

name: Reaping the Rewards
description: Complete a race of 3 or more laps at The Goliath in a Forza Edition Car.

name: Tortoise and the Hare
description: Complete a PvP Showdown Race in an X class and a D class car.

name: Hatch Me If You Can
description: Complete the Festival Drag Strip in a Hot Hatch in under 25 seconds.

name: Record Breaker
description: Get 258mph on a Speed Trap in the Bugatti Veyron Super Sport.

name: Ground Force
description: Get 3 stars at a Danger Sign in a vehicle from the Trucks Car Type.

name: Coronation Trickin'
description: Bank a Skill Chain of 195,300 or more points.

name: Never Tell Me the Odds
description: Win a race in the Peel P50.

name: Tame the Monster
description: Complete a race in an S1 class Rally Monster.

name: Made the Cut
description: Reach Round Two of the Island Conqueror.

name: Top 50%
description: Reach Round Five of the Island Conqueror.

description: Find/Smash 5 Treasure Chests.

name: Get Rich and Drive Tryin'
description: Find/Smash all 10 Treasure Chests.

name: Paved with Gold
description: Drive every Road in Fortune Island.

name: Fortune for All

Win the LEGO® Speed Champions F40 event.
